snippet: AT&T plans to start a program this week that will keep track of devices that have been reported stolen, making it more difficult for thieves to sell the devices on the black market.
abstract: AT&T plans to start a program this week that will keep track of devices that have been reported stolen, making it more difficult for thieves to sell the devices on the black market.

headline.main: AT&T to Start Blocking Stolen Cellphones This Week
